DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare continuous femoral nerve block continuous proximal adductor canal block postoperative pain control rehabilitation .
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound-guided Continuous Proximal Adductor Canal v Continuous Femoral Nerve Block Postoperative Pain Control Rehabilitation Following Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.detailed_description: Patients meet criterion : American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) class I II , schedule elective total knee arthroplasty , recruit study . Subjects randomize 2 group : receive continuous proximal adductor canal block ( ACB ) receive continuous femoral nerve block ( FNB ) .
DOC.criteria: Patients American Society Anesthesiologists Physical Status Classification System ( ASA ) score 1 2 healthy without systemic disease mild systemic disease , respectively . The patient need able decisionmaking capacity ability consent study . Patients American Society Anesthesiologists Physical Status Classification System ( ASA ) score great 2 . Patients unable decisionmaking capacity ability consent study .
DOC.keyword: continuous proximal adductor canal block ( ACB )
